info.title: Microfox Discord SDK API
info.description: Single entry-point API for all Microfox Discord SDK functions via a wrapper Lambda

post.summary: Sends a message to a specified channel or user in Discord.
post.description: This function allows sending messages to either a specific channel or directly to a user in Discord. It supports sending text content, embedding images/links, and including rich embeds. The function is versatile, enabling various types of message compositions for different communication needs.

body.description: Body of the sendMessage sls call

items.description: Message data object containing all parameters for sending a message

content.description: The text content of the message.

userId.description: The ID of the user to send a direct message to. If provided, channelId is ignored and a new DM channel is created.

channelId.description: The ID of the channel to send the message to. Required if userId is not provided.

fileUrl.description: A URL to an image or file to embed in the message. If provided, it will be displayed as an embed.

embed.description: A rich embed object to include in the message.

image.description: A URL to an image to display in the embed.

id.description: The ID of the sent message

content.description: The content of the sent message

channelId.description: The ID of the channel where the message was sent

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the message was sent

error.description: Error message describing the issue with the request

403.description: Forbidden - lack of permissions to send the message

error.description: Error message indicating lack of permissions

404.description: Not found - channel or user not found

error.description: Error message indicating the channel or user was not found
Error message describing the internal server error

post.summary: Edits an existing message in a Discord channel, allowing modification of text content and embedded media.
post.description: This function updates the content of a previously sent message in a specified Discord channel. It allows for modification of both text content and embedded media. The function can replace the existing text with new content and optionally update or add an embedded image or file.

body.description: Body of the editMessage sls call

items.description: The ID of the channel containing the message.
The ID of the message to edit.
The new text content for the message.
A new URL to an image or file to embed in the message. If provided, it will replace the existing embed.

id.description: The ID of the edited message

content.description: The updated text content of the message

channel_id.description: The ID of the channel containing the message

items.description: Embedded media in the message

embeds.description: Array of embeds in the message

error.description: Error message describing the issue with the request

403.description: Forbidden - insufficient permissions to edit the message

error.description: Error message indicating lack of permissions

404.description: Message or channel not found

error.description: Error message indicating the resource was not found
Error message describing the internal server error
